Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Kilkaalilirundhu Pokeemukku Vandhu: Naan Ungalai Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanni, Ungal Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyitta Dhesaththil Naan Ungalaik Konduvandhu Vittu, Ungalode Pannina En Udanpadikkaiyai Naan Orukkaalum Muriththuppoduvadhillai Endrum,
2 neengal Indha Dhesaththin Kudigalode Udanpadikkaipannaamal, Avargal Palipeedangalai Idiththuvidakkadaveergal Endrum Sonnen; Aanaalum En Sollaik Kelaadheponeergal; En Ippadi Seydheergal?
3 aagaiyaal Naan Avargalai Ungal Mugaththirku Munbaagath Thuraththuvadhillai Endren; Avargal Ungalai Nerukkuvaargal; Avargaludaiya Dhevargal Ungalukkuk Kanniyaavaargal Endraar.
4 karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Indha Vaarththaigalai Isravel Puththirar Ellaarodum Sollugaiyil, Janangal Uraththa Saththamittu Azhudhaargal.
5 avvidaththirkup Pokeem Endru Perittu, Ange Karththarukkup Paliyittaargal.
6 yosuvaa Isravel Puththiraraagiya Janangalai Anuppivittapodhu, Avargal Dhesaththai Sudhandhariththuk Kolla Avaravar Thangal Thangal Sudhandhara Veedhaththirkup Ponaargal.

7 yosuvaavin Sagala Naatkalilum Karththar Isravelukkaaga Seydha Avarudaiya Periya Kiriyaigalaiyellaam Kandavargalum, Yosuvaavukkup Pinbu Uyirodirundhavargalumaagiya Moopparin Sagala Naatkalilum Janangal Karththarai Seviththaargal.
8 noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaa Ennum Karththarin Oozhiyakkaaran Nootruppaththu Vayadhullavanaai Maranamadaindhaan.
9 avanai Eppiraayeemin Malaiththesaththilulla Kaayaas Malaikku Vadakkeyirukkira Avanudaiya Sudhandharaththin Ellaiyaagiya Thimnaadheresile Adakkampanninaargal.

10 akkaalaththil Irundha Andha Sandhadhiyaar Ellaarum Thangal Pidhaakkaludan Serkkappattapinbu, Karththaraiyum, Avar Isravelukkaaga Seydha Kiriyaiyaiyum Ariyaadha Veroru Sandhadhi Avargalukkuppin Ezhumbitru.
11 appozhudhu Isravel Puththirar Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhu, Paagaalgalai Seviththu,

12 thangal Pidhaakkalai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Avargaludaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Vittu, Thangalai Sutrilum Irukkira Janangaludaiya Dhevargalaagiya Anniya Dhevargalaip Pinpatrippoi, Avargalaip Panindhukondu, Karththarukkuk Kobamoottinaargal
13 avargal Karththarai Vittu, Paagaalaiyum Astharoththaiyum Seviththaargal.

14 appozhudhu Karththar Isravelin Mel Kobamoondavaraagi, Avargal Appuram Thangal Saththurukkalukku Munbaaga Nirkak Koodaadhapadi Kollaiyidugira Kollaikkaarar Kaiyil Avargalai Oppukkoduththu, Avargalai Sutrilum Irukkira Avargal Pagaignarin Kaiyile Vitruppottaar.

15 karththar Solliyapadiyum, Karththar Avargalukku Aanaiyittirundhapadiyum, Avargal Purappattuppogira Idamellaam Karththarudaiya Kai Theemaikkendre Avargalukku Virodhamaayirundhadhu; Migavum Nerukkappattaargal.
16 karththar Nyaayaadhipadhigalai Ezhumbappanninaar; Avargal Kollaiyidugiravargalin Kaikku Avargalai Neengalaakki Ratchiththaargal.

17 avargal Thangal Nyaayaadhipadhigalin Sollaik Kelaamal, Anniya Dhevargalaip Pinpatri Sorampoi, Avaigalaip Panindhukondaargal; Thangal Pidhaakkal Karththarin Karpanaigalukkuk Keezhppadindhu Nadandha Vazhiyai Avargal Seekkiramaai Vittu Vilagi, Avargal Seydhapadi Seyyaamarponaargal.

18 karththar Avargalukku Nyaayaadhipadhigalai Ezhumbappannugirapodhu, Karththar Nyaayaadhipadhiyodekooda Irundhu, Andha Nyaayaadhipadhiyin Naatkalilellaam Avargal Saththurukkalin Kaikku Avargalai Neengalaakki Ratchiththuvaruvaar; Avargal Thangalai Irugappidiththu Odukkugiravargalinimiththam Thavikkiradhinaale,karththar Manasthaabappaduvaar.

19 nyaayaadhipadhi Maranamadaindha Udane, Avargal Thirumbi, Anniya Dhevargalaip Pinpatravum Sevikkavum Panindhu Kollavum, Thangal Pidhaakkalaippaarkkilum Kedaai Nadandhu, Thangal Kirththiyangalaiyum Thangal Murattaattamaana Vazhiyaiyum Vidaadhiruppaargal.
20 aagaiyaal Karththar Isravelin Mel Kobamoondavaraagi; Indha Janangal Thangal Pidhaakkalukku Naan Karpiththa En Udanpadikkaiyai Meeri En Sollaik Kelaadheponapadiyaal,
21 yosuvaa Mariththup Pinvaiththuppona Jaadhigalil Oruvaraiyum, Naan Ini Avargalukku Munbaagath Thuraththi Vidaadhiruppen.
22 avargal Pidhaakkal Karththarin Vazhiyai Gavaniththadhupola, Avargal Adhile Nadakkumpadikku, Adhai Gavanippaargalo Illaiyo Endru, Avargalaikkondu Isravelai Sodhippadharkaaga Appadi Seyven Endraar.
23 adharkaagak Karththar Andha Jaadhigalai Yosuvaavin Kaiyil Oppukkodaamalum, Avaigalai Seekkiramaaith Thuraththividaamalum Vittuvaiththaar.
